content.raw:
I have a branch here https://bitbucket.org/arocchi/gazebo where I implemented BLEM for Gazebo/ODE (4 and 6, branches  blem_gz*) for a work I presented at ICRA 2016 - https://ras.papercept.net/conferences/scripts/abstract.pl?ConfID=119&Number=2912

Some work needs ot be done to use it also in Bullet, and also to cope with configuration of the size of the boundary layer from urdf/sdf
content.html:
I have a branch here https://bitbucket.org/arocchi/gazebo where I implemented BLEM for Gazebo/ODE (4 and 6, branches blem_gz*) for a work I presented at ICRA 2016 - https://ras.papercept.net/conferences/scripts/abstract.pl?ConfID=119&Number=2912

Some work needs ot be done to use it also in Bullet, and also to cope with configuration of the size of the boundary layer from urdf/sdf
